snippet: Elsa Schiaparelli and Miuccia Prada, two women who pushed against the status quo, are the subjects of an exhibition at the Costume Institute of the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
abstract: Italian fashion designers Elsa Schiaparelli and Miuccia Prada, two women who pushed against the status quo in the male world of modern fashion, are subjects of an exhibition at the Costume Institute of the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: Elsa Schiaparelli and Miuccia Prada, two women who pushed against the status quo, are the subjects of an exhibition at the Costume Institute of the Metropolitan Museum of Art.

headline.seo: Schiaparelli and Prada Connected With Women’s Inner Feelings
headline.main: The Edge Goes to the Women
headline.print_headline: The Edge Goes to the Women
